attributes.action: bring before Parliament a Bill to ensure that all immigrants sign a contract to abandon all Laws, customs & cultural practices that do not accord with British/ EU legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of what Dr. Rowan said today, we must avoid creating a dual system of legality that will certainly bring about social divisions in future. As a Community based mode of solving minor differences within Muslim culture, Sharia Law will probably be invaluable but the supremacy of Western codes must be established in the minds of every individual legally admitted here.
